title: 工业2与工业2实验版区别
author: ltyfll
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Body-Hi
replies.txt_content: 这里实验版指的是实验的机器很多，当然不是旧版本，我本人推荐exp实验建议搜wiki用英文名搜！！！ http://tieba.baidu.com/p/1613546425 wiki

replies.author: Body-Hi
replies.txt_content: wiki 百度 minecraft ic2 wiki

replies.author: Body-Hi
replies.txt_content: 网页翻译一下，就知道很多东西

replies.author: Body-Hi
replies.txt_content:
This is it. IC?, the future of IC. 




While playing it, you will feel right at home again, rediscovering most of the stuff known from IC. 

However, once you get your machines running, you will quickly notice how smooth and well-designed everything works now. 

Wiring is easier, batteries aren't as twosided (on/off) anymore, new cables, rubber stuff, new machines, EVERYTHING was added. 




Create obstacle courses of Metal Poles and Rubber-Sheets, explore the Nether with an Electrical Jetpack or blow up whole landscapes at once by using the Dynamite-O-Mote. 

Or discover the much more complex mechanisms of Nuclear Engineering, blow up your hut or burn your hands. 

Or grab the rusty ol' Composite Vest, and start hunting Creepers with the new, all-mighty NanoSaber.

replies.author: efsg
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 熊尼玛
replies.txt_content: 按难度从大到小分是 格雷科技>工业2实验版>工业2 想单玩都可以 不过要看你心态，格雷连原版的合成表都改了 现在的话玩实验版的比较多吧

replies.author: Body-Hi
replies.txt_content: 格雷巨坑，矿石就有几十种

replies.author: yzy_shuaige
replies.txt_content:
我来告诉你  实验班 的合成方法是很坑的  需要大量材料 很耐玩可以玩很久 但现在的服务器  我推荐用这个
原版  有些大神1天就 出量子了 不耐玩
实验版的UU机不是和原版的不一样吗
工业2实验版可以说是工业2的升级版，里面增加了很多很多的机械，合成方法也有所复杂，而且BUG也比较多。本人建议，新手应该先玩工业2，再进阶到工业2实验版。还有，现在网络上好像还没有工业2实验版的说明书和合成表，G键合成表mod也不能显示出正确的合成表，所以只能上贴吧看直播（本人亲自测试），你自己选择吧......{:10_516:}
